beats.label: HOOK
beats.narration: Here's where Pirinexus 360 breaks you. 211 mi. Zone by zone.
beats.visual: Full route map, then zoom into first zone
beats.editing_note: Start with full route visible, then rapid zoom in. Ominous music hit. Avatar suffering face.

beats.label: ZONE 1: Mile 35
beats.narration: Mile 35. La Garrotxa Volcanic Reckoning. The greenway party ends and reality hits. Seventy kilometers through volcanic terrain with 900 meters of climbing, starting with Coll de Coubet. a 9km grind that gives no respite.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Mixed gravel and asphalt with volcanic zones and technical border descent

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 1 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 2: Mile 80
beats.narration: Mile 80. Col d'Ares Death March. The 17.9km border crossing at 1.5 thousand meters where dreams die. This is where most DNFs happen and the mental breaking point that separates finishers from the field.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Mixed gravel and asphalt with volcanic zones and technical border descent

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 2 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 3: Mile 110
beats.narration: Mile 110. French Descent Carnage. After grinding to the border, the road disappears into technical rocky descents. Riders on narrow tires walk while suspension bikes roll past laughing.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Mixed gravel and asphalt with volcanic zones and technical border descent

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 3 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 4: Mile 160
beats.narration: Mile 160. Costa Brava False Hope. The coast looks like relief but delivers rolling agricultural roads and hidden climbs. Your legs are already cooked and there's still 50 miles of punishment ahead.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation
